author: adammbq
content: hi guys, I'm doing sharding (EIP 4844) research atm at university. Just wondering if the hardware requirement of doing local development and testing of ethereum is the same as running a full node?

author: sky.cactus
content: A private dev/test network has quite low operating requirements.

author: sky.cactus
content: Any computer/mobile device will probably be sufficient for a private dev/test network.

author: sky.cactus
content: Unless your plan is to do load/stress testing.
